activities.name: Box Breathing
activities.description: A simple breathing technique to reduce stress and anxiety by creating a rhythm.
steps: Inhale slowly through your nose for 4 seconds
Exhale slowly through your mouth for 4 seconds
Hold for 4 seconds before next inhale
benefits: Lowers heart rate and blood pressure

activities.name: 5-4-3-2-1 Grounding
activities.description: Engage your senses to return to the present moment and reduce anxiety.
steps: Name 5 things you can SEE around you
Name 4 things you can TOUCH or FEEL
Name 3 things you can HEAR right now

activities.name: Progressive Muscle Relaxation
activities.description: Systematically tense and release muscle groups to reduce physical tension.
steps: Start with your feet - tense for 5 seconds, release for 10
Move to calves, thighs, and glutes
Tense and release hands, arms, shoulders
Finish with face and scalp muscles

activities.name: Pomodoro Study Method
activities.description: Focused study sessions with scheduled breaks to maintain concentration.
steps: Study with full focus, no distractions
When timer rings, take a 5-minute break

activities.name: Mindful Walking
activities.description: Walk slowly while paying full attention to movement and sensations.
steps: Stand still and notice your breath
Begin walking slowly, feeling feet lift and fall
Notice sensations in legs and feet
If mind wanders, gently return to walking
Finish by standing still and noticing changes

activities.name: Gratitude Journaling
activities.description: Write down specific things you're grateful for to shift perspective.
steps: Find a quiet space with minimal distractions
Write today's date at the top
List 3 specific things you're grateful for
Describe why you're grateful for each

activities.name: Sleep Wind-Down Routine
activities.description: Prepare mind and body for restful sleep with a consistent routine.
steps: Write down worries or to-dos for tomorrow
Progressive relaxation from head to toes

activities.name: Self-Compassion Break
activities.description: Practice kindness toward yourself in difficult moments.
steps: Acknowledge: 'This is a moment of suffering'
Recognize: 'Suffering is part of being human'
Place hands over heart and say kind words

activities.name: Focus Flow Technique
activities.description: Enter a state of deep focus by eliminating distractions.

activities.name: Body Scan Meditation
activities.description: Systematically scan through the body with awareness.
steps: Slowly move attention up through the body
Breathe into any areas of tension
